channel.title: [PI] summoning cats
channel.description: ok so on my prroject insanity server, i set up a summoning base that has nothing on it but cats..it works perfectly until u drop the cat, then the cat turns around and attacks you, ive already been told to remove the NPC's from the agressive method, but the thing is, their not listed in that method..so they should have no reason to be aggressive..anyone have a fix for this?

item.title: [PI] summoning cats
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

ok so on my prroject insanity server, i set up a summoning base that has nothing on it but cats…it works perfectly until u drop the cat, then the cat turns around and attacks you, ive already been told to remove the NPC’s from the agressive method, but the thing is, their not listed in that method…so they should have no reason to be aggressive…anyone have a fix for this?
